question: Which of the following can be members of Gram Sabha?
option1: Anyone more than 18 years of age
option2: Registered voters in the area of a panchayat
option3: Anyone more than 21 years of age
answer: Registered voters in the area of a panchayat
explanation:
Gram Sabha is a body consisting of persons registered in the electoral rolls of a village which is comprised within the area of Panchayat
at the village level. It is a village assembly consisting of all the registered voters in the area of a panchayat.
